title: Good Vibes / Bad Vibes + League Traditions, Preseason Hype - Fantasy Football Podcast for 8/29
description:
On today’s fantasy football podcast, final preseason takeaways! Which players are causing good or bad vibes entering the 2022 fantasy football season? Can Justin Fields take a big step forward? Is Alvin Kamara being majorly undervalued in fantasy football drafts? Plus, the latest NFL News, and a fun way to keep leaguemates engaged! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 29th, 2022

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit and Draft Analyzer are available NOW

Compete in the largest fantasy football league! THE MEGALABOWL
